title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not include an acceptable description. Acceptable descriptions include the following.

· There is an available niche.

· There are sufficient resources.

· There are few/no competitors.

· There are few/no predators.

· There is a lack of parasites.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not include an acceptable explantion. Acceptable explanations include the following.

· The population exceeded the carrying capacity of the environment, and younger hogs were unable to compete for resources.

· The carrying capacity of the environment was reduced, and younger hogs became unable to compete for resources.

· There was a decrease in the reproductive rate, so there are fewer young hogs.

· There is a (new) predator/disease that causes lower survival rates among young hogs (compared with older hogs).

The response includes an acceptable explantion. Acceptable explanations include the following.

· The population exceeded the carrying capacity of the environment, and younger hogs were unable to compete for resources.

· The carrying capacity of the environment was reduced, and younger hogs became unable to compete for resources.

· There was a decrease in the reproductive rate, so there are fewer young hogs.

· There is a (new) predator/disease that causes lower survival rates among young hogs (compared with older hogs).
